DOC.brief_summary: The optimal wavelength phototherapy neonatal jaundice remain clarified clinical study . Previous iv vivo study show turquoise light wavelength 490 nm efficacious blue light wavelength 460 nm , golden standard phototherapy treatment today . Though , previous study use light tube , today use light emit diode ( LED 'S ) . The overall aim study therefore compare efficacy turquoise LED 's versus blue LED 's decrease total serum bilirubin neonates gestational age > 33 week uncomplicated hyperbilirubinemia .
DOC.brief_title: Comparison Between Turquoise Blue Light Treatment Neonatal Jaundice Using Light Emission Diodes
DOC.criteria: Newborns gestational age > 33 week neonatal hyperbilirubinemia require treatment phototherapy accord national guideline Haemolytic disease ( Rhesus Kell blood type isoimmunization , spherocytosis ) Liver disease
